pages.text: $(li)The Straddler is a hostile mob that likes to live in the Basalt Deltas of the Nether.$(br)$(li)It will use $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/stradpole)Stradpole$(/l) as projectiles.$(br)$(li)It will do anything to stay far away from you.$(br)Straddlers may drop Basalt and sometimes Straddlite on death.
Straddlite can be used to craft a Straddleboard in a Crafting Table.
